document:
&project;
2017 News and Status
The Apache Tomcat team is proud to announce the immediate availability of Tomcat Native 1.2.16. This is a bugfix release that also updates the dependencies for the Windows binaries and includes Windows binaries built with OpenSSL 1.0.2m and APR 1.6.3.
The Apache Tomcat team is proud to announce the immediate availability of Tomcat Native 1.2.14. This is a bugfix release that also updates the dependencies for the Windows binaries and includes Windows binaries built with OpenSSL 1.0.2l and APR 1.6.2.
The Apache Tomcat team is proud to announce the immediate availability of Tomcat Native 1.2.12. This is a release to update dependencies for the Windows binaries and includes Windows binaries built with OpenSSL 1.0.2k and APR 1.5.2.
